channel.title: Convention on Ding's Coding Forge
channel.description: Recent content in Convention on Ding's Coding Forge

item.title: [Go] Go Convention
item.description: There aren’t many Go developers in Korea, and major IT companies using Go are as rare as unicorns. At my company, we have accumulated our own know-how over the years while developing with Go. Here, I’d like to suggest some key conventions that I believe are useful for maintaining services in the long run.

item.title: [Python] FastAPI Convention
item.description: People tend to say fastapi has no best practice.. As a Software Developer, main in Object Oriented Language i'll suggest class based fastapi best practice
